questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes - The image features a character surrounded by an aura in the center of the card.
no - The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it includes items on the side like pencils and markers.
no - The title on the label at the top reads 'GIN RLY.X•C,O', not 'GNRLYXYZ'.
no - '1/1' is not displayed directly below 'GIN RLY.X•C,O' on the label.
no - There is no barcode beneath '1/1'; instead, there are graphics and text.
no - There is no grade label displayed on the right side of the top label.
no - There is no numeric grade from the scale displayed below any grade label as the label doesn't exist.
no - There is no certification number displayed below a numeric grade as neither exist.
no - The text on the label is not uniform in size; the title at the top is significantly larger than other text.
no - There is difficulty in balanced padding from the border for all text on the label due to varying font sizes.
no - The background is not pure white as the card and surrounding items are displayed on a mixed background.
no - The card itself contains text and labels, not a full display without any text or labels.
